import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, Row, FormGroup, Label, Input, Progress } from 'reactstrap'; export default ({ account, statisticWLPlayers }) => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const statisticChooseName = statisticWLPlayers[name] const totalMatchs = () => { if(!account.length) return; const player = [...account].filter(e => e.ingame === name)[0] return player.win + player.lose } console.log(statisticChooseName, account, totalMatchs()) return
Statistic Players setName(e.target.value) }> { account.map(acc => { return }) } 'PS.HÃ¡ckMap'
}
